name: 1K Defender
description:
1k Defender

A pico-8 game developed for the Pico 1k Jam 2022.

Shoot all the things.

The whole game fits in a URL

Controls
  • Up/Down
  • Left/Right
  • X to fire
  • Z to restart
Credits

Written by: Greg Gaughan

(A full non-jam version is also available: Pico Defender)
